NewsItem.HEADLINE: MEXP-RAN-18-EI4
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This report provides a calculation of the demand and capacity for various LTE and 5G networks, illustrating when and how major networks will need mm-wave bands to meet demand.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report is a high level view of the detailed modeling Mobile Experts has conducted on 5G, to illustrate how LAA, CBRS, and LTE m-MIMO will add capacity but will not keep up with growing demand. The growth in demand is illustrated by the growth in cord cutting in the USA and expected demand will outstrip the capacity of the bands below 6 GHz. The charts show a clear illustration of how mm-wave bands will come into play, and the amount of capacity needed from mm-wave sites.
